Term.Name: Company Registration Number
Term.Definition: A number used to identify a registered company in the country where it is registered. In the United Kingdom these are numbers recorded by Companies House.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Organisation Customer Number
Term.Definition: An identifier used by an organisation to identify its customers within its own accounting system
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Organisation Internal Department Number
Term.Definition: An identifier used by an organisation to identify its own internal departments
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Organisation Supplier Number
Term.Definition: An identifier used by an organisation to identify its suppliers within its own accounting system
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Registered Charity Number
Term.Definition: A number used to identify a registered charity
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Swift Number
Term.Definition: A number by which a financial institution is known to the Society for the Worldwide International Funds Transfer system (SWIFT)
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: VAT Registration Number
Term.Definition: An identifier by which an organisation is known to the Value Added Tax authority in the country of its registration
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: British Bank Sort Code
Term.Definition: An identifier used by financial institutions in the UK to identify specific individual branches. It has the structure 'nn nn nn' where n represents an integer
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: EUMC Organisation Code
Term.Definition: An organisation number allocated by the European Union Monitoring Centre's RAXEN system. This includes numbers for several media organisations across Europe which are involved in EU sponsored moves to combat racism and xenophobia
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML
